title: 10+  S rated games, Still no token. (SR games)
body: Pretty much what  is says, was grinding out my Lv 7 on akali and i just stopped getting tokens. I have 2 of the 3 i need but the last one just wont drop. Been over a month now.

replies.body: I took a look into this for you, but the last S I see here is an S-.  While that's great grade, it needs to be an S or S+ to receive a token.  S- won't give a token at this level, per the [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide.  Let me know if that clears things up!
Did not know S- did not give them. Thanks for thr insight on that!
Why are minuses even a thing?
Because they allow to have 15 different grades with only 5 letters, instead of only 10 different grades.
